languages.text: "Я пытаюсь сказать... Если Лорд-капитан сочтет, что излишне близкие контакты с агентом Инквизиции оказывают тлетворное влияние на ее репутацию и ставят облик помазанницы Бога-Императора под удар, я с уважением приму такое решение".

traits.locale_text: "Я пытаюсь сказать... Если Лорд-капитан сочтет, что излишне близкие контакты с агентом Инквизиции оказывают тлетворное влияние на ее репутацию и ставят облик помазанницы Бога-Императора под удар, я с уважением приму такое решение".

languages.text: "What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."
languages.original_text: "Я пытаюсь сказать... Если Лорд-капитан сочтет, что излишне близкие контакты с агентом Инквизиции оказывают тлетворное влияние на ее репутацию и ставят облик помазанницы Бога-Императора под удар, я с уважением приму такое решение".

traits.locale_text: "What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."

"What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."

"What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."

"What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."

languages.text: “我只想说……如果舰长大人认为，与审判庭的特工接触过于亲密，可能会对她的声誉造成负面影响，有损她作为神皇的神选者的形象，我完全愿意尊重、接受她的决定。”
languages.original_text: "What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."

traits.locale_text: “我只想说……如果舰长大人认为，与审判庭的特工接触过于亲密，可能会对她的声誉造成负面影响，有损她作为神皇的神选者的形象，我完全愿意尊重、接受她的决定。”

languages.text: «Lo que intento decir es que... si la Lord Capitán opina que un contacto excesivamente cercano con un agente de la Inquisición puede afectar negativamente a su reputación y pondrá en peligro su imagen como elegida del Dios Emperador, aceptaré respetuosamente su decisión».
languages.original_text: "What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que intento decir es que... si la Lord Capitán opina que un contacto excesivamente cercano con un agente de la Inquisición puede afectar negativamente a su reputación y pondrá en peligro su imagen como elegida del Dios Emperador, aceptaré respetuosamente su decisión».

languages.text: 「俺が言いたいのは…ロード・キャプテンが異端審問庁のエージェントと過度に接触することが彼女の評判に悪影響を及ぼし、神帝陛下に選ばれし者としてのそのイメージを損なうと考えるのならば、俺は謹んでその決定を受け入れるということだ」
languages.original_text: "What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."

traits.locale_text: 「俺が言いたいのは…ロード・キャプテンが異端審問庁のエージェントと過度に接触することが彼女の評判に悪影響を及ぼし、神帝陛下に選ばれし者としてのそのイメージを損なうと考えるのならば、俺は謹んでその決定を受け入れるということだ」

languages.text: « Ce que j'essaie de vous dire, c'est que... si la seigneure-capitaine estime qu'une relation intime avec un agent de l'Inquisition risque de porter préjudice à sa réputation et de ternir son image d'élue de l'Empereur-Dieu, alors je ne m'opposerai pas à sa décision. »
languages.original_text: "What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."

traits.locale_text: « Ce que j'essaie de vous dire, c'est que... si la seigneure-capitaine estime qu'une relation intime avec un agent de l'Inquisition risque de porter préjudice à sa réputation et de ternir son image d'élue de l'Empereur-Dieu, alors je ne m'opposerai pas à sa décision. »

languages.text: "Was ich damit sagen will ... wenn der Lord Captain glaubt, dass ein zu enges Verhältnis mit einem Agenten der Inquisition ihrem Ruf schaden und ihr Bild als Auserwählte des Gottimperators beeinträchtigen könnte, werde ich ihren Entschluss respektvoll akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."

traits.locale_text: "Was ich damit sagen will ... wenn der Lord Captain glaubt, dass ein zu enges Verhältnis mit einem Agenten der Inquisition ihrem Ruf schaden und ihr Bild als Auserwählte des Gottimperators beeinträchtigen könnte, werde ich ihren Entschluss respektvoll akzeptieren."

languages.text: "Söylemeye çalıştığım şu ki... Eğer Lord Kaptan, Engizisyon'un bir ajanıyla oldukça yakın bir ilişki kurmanın itibarında tahrip edici bir etkiye neden olacağını ve Tanrı İmparator'un Seçilmişi olarak imajını tehlikeye atacağını düşünüyorsa kararını saygıyla kabul edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "What I'm trying to say is... if the Lord Captain believes that overly close contact with an agent of the Inquisition will have a detrimental effect on her reputation and jeopardise her image as the God-Emperor's chosen, I will respectfully accept her decision."

traits.locale_text: "Söylemeye çalıştığım şu ki... Eğer Lord Kaptan, Engizisyon'un bir ajanıyla oldukça yakın bir ilişki kurmanın itibarında tahrip edici bir etkiye neden olacağını ve Tanrı İmparator'un Seçilmişi olarak imajını tehlikeye atacağını düşünüyorsa kararını saygıyla kabul edeceğim."
